mapper.insert: insert into member(id, pwd, email, team) values(#{id}, #{pwd}, #{email}, #{team})
mapper.select: select * from member where id = #{id} and pwd = #{pwd}
mapper.update: update member set lastlogin = now() where id = #{id}
update member set pwd = #{pwd}, email = #{email}, team = #{team} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from member order by lastlogin desc
